creator: rroeilck@no-spam.hu
text:
unexpected error message:

Additionally, a 403 Forbidden error was encountered while trying to use an
ErrorDocument to handle the request.

what's this "while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request" ?

i don't use ErrorDocument in my configuration.

i got this error message when i played with FollowSymLinks off.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
You don't give enough configuration details to be sure, but this is probably a dupe.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 28515 ***
